title: Red Is the Color Of...
description: 'I hate my red hair!'Tiffany feels that her red hair makes her weird and different from everybody else. But her mother knows that the color red is not weird at all. It is what makes things vibrantly beautiful. Roses are red. Red is a color of the rainbow. Christmas stockings are red. Listen in on a conversation between Tiffany and her mother as Tiffany is taught what else Red Is the Color Of...
author: Tiffany Haisten
